content.text: Put Not Your Trust in Princes
Praise the !
Praise the , O my soul!
I will praise the  as long as I live;
I will sing praises to my God while I have my being.
Put not your trust in princes,
in a son of man, in whom there is no salvation.
When his breath departs, he returns to the earth;
on that very day his plans perish.
Blessed is he whose help is the God of Jacob,
whose hope is in the  his God,
who made heaven and earth,
the sea, and all that is in them,
who keeps faith forever;
who executes justice for the oppressed,
who gives food to the hungry.
The  sets the prisoners free;
the  opens the eyes of the blind.
The  lifts up those who are bowed down;
the  loves the righteous.
The  watches over the sojourners;
he upholds the widow and the fatherless,
but the way of the wicked he brings to ruin.
The  will reign forever,
your God, O Zion, to all generations.
Praise the !
